1: ה֣וֹי <sup>1945 </sup> <n>Woe</n> הַיֹּרְדִ֤ים <sup>3381 </sup> <n>to them that go down</n> מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <sup>4714 </sup> <n>to Egypt</n> לְעֶזְרָ֔ה <sup>5833 </sup> <n>for help</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> סוּסִ֖ים <sup>5483 </sup> <n>on horses</n> יִשָּׁעֵ֑נוּ <sup>8172 </sup> <n>and stay</n> וַיִּבְטְח֨וּ <sup>982 </sup> <n>and trust</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> רֶ֜כֶב <sup>7393 </sup> <n>in chariots</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> רָ֗ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>because [they are] many</n> וְעַ֤ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and in</n> פָּֽרָשִׁים֙ <sup>6571 </sup> <n>and in horsemen</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> עָצְמ֣וּ <sup>6105 </sup> <n>strong</n> מְאֹ֔ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>because they are very</n> וְלֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> שָׁעוּ֙ <sup>8159 </sup> <n>but they look</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>unto</n> קְד֣וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>not unto the Holy One</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> דָרָֽשׁוּ׃ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>neither seek</n>
2: וְגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> ה֤וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> חָכָם֙ <sup>2450 </sup> <n>Yet he also [is] wise</n> וַיָּ֣בֵא <sup>935 </sup> <n>and will bring</n> רָ֔ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דְּבָרָ֖יו <sup>1697 </sup> <n>his words</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and does not</n> הֵסִ֑יר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>and will not call back</n> וְקָם֙ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>but will arise</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>against the house</n> מְרֵעִ֔ים <sup>7489 </sup> <n>of the evildoers</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and against</n> עֶזְרַ֖ת <sup>5833 </sup> <n>and against the help</n> פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <sup>6466 </sup> <n>of them that work</n> אָֽוֶן׃ <sup>205 </sup> <n>iniquity</n>
3: וּמִצְרַ֤יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>Now the Egyptians</n> אָדָם֙ <sup>120 </sup> <n>[are] men</n> וְֽלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and not</n> אֵ֔ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>and not God</n> וְסוּסֵיהֶ֥ם <sup>5483 </sup> <n>and their horses</n> בָּשָׂ֖ר <sup>1320 </sup> <n>flesh</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and not</n> ר֑וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>and not spirit</n> וַֽיהוָ֞ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>When the LORD</n> יַטֶּ֣ה <sup>5186 </sup> <n>shall stretch out</n> יָד֗וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>his hand</n> וְכָשַׁ֤ל <sup>3782 </sup> <n>shall fall</n> עוֹזֵר֙ <sup>5826 </sup> <n>both he that helpeth</n> וְנָפַ֣ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>shall fall down</n> עָזֻ֔ר <sup>5826 </sup> <n>and he that is holpen</n> וְיַחְדָּ֖ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> כֻּלָּ֥ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> יִכְלָיֽוּן׃ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>and they all shall fail</n> ס
4: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> כֹ֣ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָֽמַר־ <sup>559 </sup> <n>spoken</n> יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>For thus hath the LORD</n> אֵלַ֡י <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יֶהְגֶּה֩ <sup>1897 </sup> <n>roaring</n> הָאַרְיֵ֨ה <sup>738 </sup> <n>unto me Like as the lion</n> וְהַכְּפִ֜יר <sup>3715 </sup> <n>and the young lion</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> טַרְפּ֗וֹ <sup>2964 </sup> <n>on his prey</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יִקָּרֵ֤א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>is called forth</n> עָלָיו֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>Against</n> מְלֹ֣א <sup>4393 </sup> <n>when a multitude</n> רֹעִ֔ים <sup>7462 </sup> <n>of shepherds</n> מִקּוֹלָם֙ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>of their voice</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יֵחָ֔ת <sup>2865 </sup> <n>against him [he] will not be afraid</n> וּמֵֽהֲמוֹנָ֖ם <sup>1995 </sup> <n>himself for the noise</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יַֽעֲנֶ֑ה <sup>6031 </sup> <n>nor abase</n> כֵּ֗ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>So</n> יֵרֵד֙ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>come down</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of them so shall the LORD</n> צְבָא֔וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> לִצְבֹּ֥א <sup>6633 </sup> <n>to fight</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> הַר־ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>for mount</n> צִיּ֖וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>Zion</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> גִּבְעָתָֽהּ׃ <sup>1389 </sup> <n>and for the hill</n>
5: כְּצִפֳּרִ֣ים <sup>6833 </sup> <n>As birds</n> עָפ֔וֹת <sup>5774 </sup> <n>flying</n> כֵּ֗ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> יָגֵ֛ן <sup>1598 </sup> <n>defend</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>so will the LORD</n> צְבָא֖וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>Jerusalem</n> גָּנ֥וֹן <sup>1598 </sup> <n>defending</n> וְהִצִּ֖יל <sup>5337 </sup> <n>also he will deliver</n> פָּסֹ֥חַ <sup>6452 </sup> <n>[it and] passing over</n> וְהִמְלִֽיט׃ <sup>4422 </sup> <n>he will preserve</n>
6: שׁ֗וּבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>Turn</n> לַאֲשֶׁ֛ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> הֶעְמִ֥יקוּ <sup>6009 </sup> <n>have deeply</n> סָרָ֖ה <sup>5627 </sup> <n>revolted</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>ye unto [him from] whom the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
7: כִּ֚י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>For in that day</n> הַה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יִמְאָס֗וּן <sup>3988 </sup> <n>shall cast away</n> אִ֚ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> אֱלִילֵ֣י <sup>457 </sup> <n>his idols</n> כַסְפּ֔וֹ <sup>3701 </sup> <n>of silver</n> וֶאֱלִילֵ֖י <sup>457 </sup> <n>and his idols</n> זְהָב֑וֹ <sup>2091 </sup> <n>of gold</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשׂ֥וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>have made</n> לָכֶ֛ם יְדֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>which your own hands</n> חֵֽטְא׃ <sup>2399 </sup> <n>unto you [for] a sin</n>
8: וְנָפַ֤ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>fall</n> אַשּׁוּר֙ <sup>804 </sup> <n>Then shall the Assyrian</n> בְּחֶ֣רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>with the sword</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>not of a mighty man</n> וְחֶ֥רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>and the sword</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אָדָ֖ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>not of a mean man</n> תֹּֽאכֲלֶ֑נּוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>shall devour</n> וְנָ֥ס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>him but he shall flee</n> לוֹ֙ מִפְּנֵי־ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>from</n> חֶ֔רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>the sword</n> וּבַחוּרָ֖יו <sup>970 </sup> <n>and his young men</n> לָמַ֥ס <sup>4522 </sup> <n>shall be discomfited</n> יִהְיֽוּ׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will become</n>
9: וְסַלְעוֹ֙ <sup>5553 </sup> <n>to his strong hold</n> מִמָּג֣וֹר <sup>4032 </sup> <n>for fear</n> יַֽעֲב֔וֹר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>And he shall pass over</n> וְחַתּ֥וּ <sup>2865 </sup> <n>shall be afraid</n> מִנֵּ֖ס <sup>5251 </sup> <n>of the ensign</n> שָׂרָ֑יו <sup>8269 </sup> <n>and his princes</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whose</n> א֥וּר <sup>217 </sup> <n>whose fire</n> לוֹ֙ בְּצִיּ֔וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>[is] in Zion</n> וְתַנּ֥וּר <sup>8574 </sup> <n>and his furnace</n> ל֖וֹ בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>in Jerusalem</n> ס
